Package org.jsfml.graphics

Interface Transformable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicTransformable, CircleButton, CircleShape, CompoundEntity, ConvexShape, Marker, Particle, RectangleButton, RectangleShape, Shape, Sprite, Text, Text
public interface Transformable
Interface for transformable objects that can be positioned in the scene and rotated and scaled around an origin.

An implementation of this interface is provided by the BasicTransformable class.

  • Method Details

    • setPosition

      void setPosition(float x, float y)
      Sets the position of this object in the scene so that its origin will be exactly on it.
      Parameters:
      x - the new X coordinate.
      y - the new Y coordinate.

    • setPosition

      void setPosition(Vector2f v)
      Sets the position of this object in the scene so that its origin will be exactly on it.
      Parameters:
      v - the new position.

    • setRotation

      void setRotation(float angle)
      Sets the rotation of this object around its origin.
      Parameters:
      angle - the new rotation angle in degrees.

    • setScale

      void setScale(float x, float y)
      Sets the scaling of this object, using its origin as the scaling center.
      Parameters:
      x - the new X scaling factor.
      y - the new Y scaling factor.

    • setScale

      void setScale(Vector2f factors)
      Sets the scaling of this object, using its origin as the scaling center.
      Parameters:
      factors - the new scaling factors.

    • setOrigin

      void setOrigin(float x, float y)
      Sets the rotation, scaling and drawing origin of this object.
      Parameters:
      x - the new X coordinate of the origin.
      y - the new Y coordinate of the origin.

    • setOrigin

      void setOrigin(Vector2f v)
      Sets the rotation, scaling and drawing origin of this object.
      Parameters:
      v - the new origin.

    • getPosition

      Vector2f getPosition()
      Gets the position of this object.

      Returns:

    • move

      void move(float x, float y)
      Moves this object.
      Parameters:
      x - the X offset added to the current position.

    • move

      void move(Vector2f v)
      Moves the object.
      Parameters:
      v - the offset vector added to the current position.

    • rotate

      void rotate(float angle)

    • scale
